content.rendered:
The Marshal Industrial Arm Chair is made with a solid steel frame in a clear lacquer. The Marshal is then upholstered in vintage leather for a real heavy duty, industrial feel and look.

Perfect for heavy duty environments. 1 year warranty. Held in stock.
